hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Preparing tmp=/tmp/jenkins/${JOB_NAME} mkdir -p $tmp
# ENV URL=https://eu0.cdn.subut.ai:8338/kurjun/rest filename="management-stable.deb"
# get current file id function jsonval { temp=`echo $json | sed 's/\\\\\//\//g' | sed 's/[{}]//g' | awk -v k="text" '{n=split($0,a,","); for (i=1; i<=n; i++) print a[i]}' | sed 's/\"\:\"/\|/g' | sed 's/[\,]/ /g' | sed 's/\"//g' | grep -w $prop` echo ${temp##*|} }
json=`curl -k -s -X GET $URL/apt/info?name=$filename` prop='id' id=`jsonval`
cd management
# build deb mvn clean install -Dmaven.test.skip=true -P deb -Dgit.branch=stable
# move builded file #mv `ls server/server-karaf/target/*.deb` $tmp/$filename find server/server-karaf/target/ -name "*.deb" | xargs -I {} mv {} $tmp/$filename
#preparing data for uploader echo "file=$tmp/$filename" > ../env.properties echo "id=$id" >> ../env.properties echo "dir=apt" >> ../env.properties

set +x URL=https://eu0.cdn.subut.ai:8338/kurjun/rest USER=jenkins AUTHID=$(curl -s -k "$URL/auth/token?user=$USER" | gpg --clearsign --no-tty) token=$(curl -s -k -Fmessage="$AUTHID" -Fuser=$USER "$URL/auth/token")
curl -s -k -Ffile=@$file -Ftoken=$token "$URL/$dir/upload"
# delete old file curl -s -k -X DELETE "$URL/apt/delete?id=$id&token=$token"

# Preparing tmp=/tmp/jenkins/${JOB_NAME} mkdir -p $tmp
# ENV URL=https://eu0.cdn.subut.ai:8338/kurjun/rest version=$(/var/lib/jenkins/.opt/xidel -s management/pom.xml -e "<project><parent></parent><version>{.}" | cut -d '-' -f1) filename="management-subutai-template_${version}_amd64.tar.gz"
# get current file id function jsonval { temp=`echo $json | sed 's/\\\\\//\//g' | sed 's/[{}]//g' | awk -v k="text" '{n=split($0,a,","); for (i=1; i<=n; i++) print a[i]}' | sed 's/\"\:\"/\|/g' | sed 's/[\,]/ /g' | sed 's/\"//g' | grep -w $prop` echo ${temp##*|} }
json=`curl -k -s -X GET $URL/template/info?name=$filename` prop='id' id=`jsonval`
# build template ssh root@gw.intra.lan <<- EOF /apps/bin/subutai destroy management /apps/bin/subutai clone openjre16 management sleep 20 /apps/bin/lxc-attach -n management -- apt-get update /apps/bin/lxc-attach -n management -- sync /apps/bin/lxc-attach -n management -- apt-get -y --force-yes install management-stable /apps/bin/lxc-attach -n management -- wget -q 'https://cdn.subut.ai:8338/kurjun/rest/raw/get?owner=subutai&name=influxdb.conf' -O /etc/influxdb/influxdb.conf /apps/bin/lxc-attach -n management -- openssl req -newkey rsa:2048 -new -nodes -x509 -days 3650 -subj '/C=KG/ST=Subutai/L=Bishkek/O=Kyrgyzstan/CN=gw.intra.lan' -keyout /etc/influxdb/influxkey.pem -out etc/influxdb/influxcert.pem /apps/bin/lxc-attach -n management -- sh -c 'cat /etc/influxdb/influxkey.pem /etc/influxdb/influxcert.pem > /etc/influxdb/influxdb.pem' /apps/bin/lxc-attach -n management -- mkdir -p /opt/gorjun/etc/ /apps/bin/lxc-attach -n management -- sh -c 'echo "[CDN]\nnode = ${cdnHost}:8338" > /opt/gorjun/etc/gorjun.gcfg' /apps/bin/lxc-attach -n management -- systemctl stop management /apps/bin/lxc-attach -n management -- rm -rf /opt/subutai-mng/keystores/ /apps/bin/lxc-attach -n management -- sync /apps/bin/subutai export management -v ${version} EOF
# move template to jenkins instance ssh root@gw.intra.lan "mv /mnt/lib/lxc/tmpdir/management-subutai-template_${version}_amd64.tar.gz /mnt/lib/lxc/jenkins/rootfs/$tmp/$filename"
#preparing data for uploader echo "file=$tmp/$filename" > env.properties echo "id=$id" >> env.properties echo "dir=template" >> env.properties

set +x URL=https://eu0.cdn.subut.ai:8338/kurjun/rest USER=jenkins AUTHID=$(curl -s -k "$URL/auth/token?user=$USER" | gpg --clearsign --no-tty) token=$(curl -s -k -Fmessage="$AUTHID" -Fuser=$USER "$URL/auth/token")
#curl -s -k -Ffile=@$file -Ftoken=$token "$URL/$dir/upload" SIGNATURE=$(curl -s -k -Ffile=@$file -Ftoken=$token "$URL/template/upload" | gpg --clearsign --no-tty) curl -s -k -Ftoken="$token" -Fsignature="$SIGNATURE" "$URL/auth/sign"
# delete old file curl -s -k -X DELETE "$URL/template/delete?id=$id&token=$token"
